skillTree.localised_description: Even when not feasting, the Beastmen taste blood on their lips, smell it on their fur, and want for more.

skillTree.localised_description: He knows. Nobody knows how, but he does. He has always just known.

skillTree.localised_description: Chaos smiles upon them, granting unnatural and heretical defence against mortal machinations.

skillTree.localised_description: Stalking across the lands of Man like a black, hobbled crow, Slugtongue turns the most fecund and fertile valleys into barren and freezing wastes crawling with poisonous vermin.

effects.description:
Increased chance of plague breaking out at the start of each turn.
	(Lord's army)
Attribute: Vanguard Deployment

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

skillTree.localised_description: Wherever Slugtongue goes destruction and famine follows him. Ravenous living hurricanes of skull-headed locusts whip and tear across the crop-fields, reducing them to shocking ruin in seconds. Rivers of virgin meltwater turn to bile at the sound of his gurgling, phlegm-choked laughter.

effects.description: (when in enemy region)

Slugtongue leaves "The Black Harvest" effects in enemy regions
	(effects lasts 3 turns)

Plague duration: +3 turns
	(local enemy region)

skillTree.localised_description: At first glance, Slugtongue could be mistaken for a death-devil, for his head is little more than a leering, bovine skull and his emaciated body is covered with liver-spots and coarse, white hair. Yet on closer inspection Slugtongue teems with life, albeit of the basest kind - he is host to colonies of fat black lice, hopping fleas, bloated tics, wriggling worms and stink-bodied cockroaches that infest every dank crevice of his wretched frame.

effects.description: Upgrades ability: "Curse of the Famine Fiend"

attributes.bullet_text: This unit cannot run and will only move at walking pace.

effects.description: Attribute: Causes Fear

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

effects.description: Attribute: Causes Terror

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

skillTree.localised_description: Those who follow Slugtongue are ready for slaughter, knowing full well that war follows famine as surely as winter follows autumn. When the armies of the starving and frightened march to confront Slugtongue they are met by hordes of well-fed, hot-tempered and battle-ready Beastmen who descend upon them from every direction.

effects.description: (all provinces)

Chance of a plague spreading: +15%
	(all armies factionwide)

Melee defence: +6 for Gor Herd and Bestigor Herd units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +10 for Gor Herd and Bestigor Herd units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: A master of Wild Magic and Shyish, Slugtongue's very presence causes his foes to begin to wither away from his supernatural blight.

effects.description: Enables "Slugtongue's Curse!" contact effect (damage over time)

Army ability: "Viletide"

skillTree.localised_description: As repugnant as Slugtongue is at first-hand, the signs of his passing are just as disturbing. With a single whispered phrase, he can unleash the power of blight upon the land and those that defend it.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit can pass through trees.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

factionEffects.localised_description: Stalking across the lands of Man like a black, hobbled crow, Slugtongue turns the most fecund and fertile valleys into barren and freezing wastes crawling with poisonous vermin. Everything Mankind does to harness nature, every act of order intended to trammel the chaos of the wild, can be undone by a single gesture from Slugtongue's blackened claw. Slugtongue is the cold talon of winter incarnate, and famine follows in his wake.

effects.description: Plagues bolster your forces and nurture your settlements
Unit capacity: +4 for Pestigors
Immune to Plague attrition
Enables poison attacks for Gor Herd and Bestigor Herd units
Passive ability: "Regeneration" for Gor Herd and Bestigor Herd units

backgroundSkills.localised_description: The repulsive creature known as Molokh Slugtongue is anathema to cultivated life and natural harmony. Everything Mankind does to harness nature, every act of order intended to trammel the chaos of the wild, can be undone by a single gesture from Slugtongue's blackened claw. Slugtongue is the cold talon of winter incarnate, and famine follows in his wake.

effects.description: Immortal

Raiding stance is upgraded to "Infectious raiding stance"
	(increased chance to spread plague)

A plague is spread to a nearby settlement after winning a battle.
	Small chance for a plague to break out at start of each turn.

	(Lord's army)
Passive ability: "Curse of the Famine Fiend"
